attributes.action: To introduce a pricing structure for all Banks and Building Societies so that everyone will know ,across the board what charges they will have to pay, for overdrafts, mortgage fees, ect.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Every Bank and building society is allowed to set its own charges and fees. If there was one "right across the board" pricing structure, every person would be able to know and understand, what fees they are paying.
Quite often the language that is used in the "terms and conditions" issued by banks is hard to read and understand. The eldery often get confused because of this. One pricing structure for all will alleviate confusion and make this simple and easy to understand. It will also stop banks  / building societies from setting rip off fees and charges.
